item.title: write-up: Passe ton Hack d'abord: 1 programming challenge
item.description: I’ve tried to do some challenges during that CTF. Here’s my solution for the first programming challenge: from pwn import * r = remote('37.59.31.202', 2000) print(r.recv(1024)) r.sendline(b'1') print(r.recv(1024)) i = 1 while True: i += 1 if i == 102: print(r.recv(1024)) break evaluated = eval(r.recvline().decode()) print("[*] evaluated: {}".format(evaluated)) r.sendline(str(evaluated).encode()) r.close()
